column1: With the covid-19 self isolation restriction in place, is there mandatory registration/check in with any agency upon arrival at the airport?
Ever hear of Google? Appears to be a check-in station but mandatory?https://abqsunport.com/at-sunport/covid-19/
Seriously. It would have been faster to google this than to make the post in the forum.
You guys are a friendly bunch. The nerve of them for asking a travel question in a travel forum.
